Description:
This mod adds the dwemer race to skyrim.
This is a beta so it isn't fully featured as I wanted it to be, and this race is gonna be apart of another mod im gonna make.

[color=red]Requires SKSE[/color]

This mod adds:
Dwemer Race (Player Only)
3 Summon Spells (Summon Dwemer Centurion, Summon Dwemer Sphere, Summon Dwemer Centurion and Dwemer Sphere) [2 min once a day]
Dwemer Faction Race Ability (You wont get attacked by any of the Dwemer Automatrons)


Installation:
Copy the DwemerRace.esp and DwemerRace.bsa into your skyrim data directory.

Uninstallation:
Remove the DwemerRace.esp and the DwemerRace.bsa from the skyrim data directory

Change Log:
[Version 1.0 alpha] (never released)
Initial Mod

[Version 1.0 beta]
Fixed the summon spells problem of not spawning the NPC.
Added 2 More summon spells from the initial mod.

Future Updates:
I will try making all the Eye Textures available to this race.

Developers:
[DarkWolfModding]
All Aspects of the mod

Thanks To:MrRhexx for making the lore video on the dwemer.
[/size]
author: DarkWolfModding
